Sentencas: A variety of seals such as metal-metal, metal-ceramic, and ceramic-ceramic are required for a functioning solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC).
Titulo: Sealing technology for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: These seals must function at high temperatures between 600 and 900 degrees C and in oxidizing and reducing environments of the fuels and air.
Titulo: Sealing technology for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: Among the different type of seals, the metal-ceramic and ceramic-ceramic seals require significant attention, research, and development because the brittle nature of ceramics and glasses can lead to fracture and loss of seal integrity and functionality.
Titulo: Sealing technology for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: This paper addresses the needs and possible approaches for high-temperature ceramic-metal seals for SOFC and seals fabricated using some of these approaches.
Titulo: Sealing technology for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: A new concept of self-healing glass seals is proposed, developed, and used for making metal-glass-ceramic seals for potential application in SOFC in order to enhance the reliability and life of a cell.
Titulo: Sealing technology for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: In this study, glasses displaying self-healing behavior are investigated and used to fabricate seals.
Titulo: Sealing technology for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: The performance of these seals under long-term exposure at higher temperatures coupled with thermal cycling is characterized by leak tests.
Titulo: Sealing technology for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: The self-healing ability of these glass seals is also demonstrated by leak tests along with the long-term performance.
Titulo: Sealing technology for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)
